articles.author: Benj Edwards
articles.title: OpenAI and Nvidia’s $100B AI plan will require power equal to 10 nuclear reactors - Ars Technica
articles.description: “This is a giant project,” Nvidia CEO said of new 10-gigawatt AI infrastructure deal.

articles.author: Sarah Perez
articles.title: Google’s Gemini AI is coming to your TV - TechCrunch
articles.description: When fully rolled out, Google's AI will be on over 300 million active Google TV and other Android TV OS-powered devices.
articles.content: Google’s AI assistant, Gemini, is coming to your TV. On Monday, the company announced it’s introducing Gemini for Google TV, allowing TV owners to engage in free-flowing, natural language conversatio… [+1504 chars]
